channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Live tennis on an action-packed day at Wimbledon, with the fourth round of the men's and women's singles due to be played. On this day in 2024, Britain's Emma Raducanu's challenge was brought to an end by New Zealand qualifier Lulu Sun, while eventual men's winner Carlos Alcaraz beat Frenchman Ugo Humbert in four sets.
